Class EPLLocalDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.jdbc.local.EPLLocalDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.Wrapper, javax.sql.CommonDataSource, javax.sql.DataSource

    public class EPLLocalDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sql.DataSource
    Local data source.

      • setProviderURI

        public void setProviderURI(java.lang.String providerURI)
        Sets the provider URI to connect to. The database name property is equivalent and can also be used to set the provider URI.
        Parameters:
        providerURI - is the provider URI, or null for the default provider

      • getProviderURI

        public java.lang.String getProviderURI()
        Returns the provider URI to connect to. The database name property is equivalent and can also be used to set the provider URI.
        Returns:
        provider URI, or null if not set and to connect to the default provider
